item.title: 戴姆勒卡车宣布新的股票回购计划
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车控股公司（Daimler Truck Holding AG）将回购 20 亿欧元（约合 23.4 亿美元）的自有股票，即使向低排放车辆的过渡增加了成本，该公司仍将延续向股东返还现金的政策。【原文：Daimler Truck Holding AG will buy back €2 billion ($2.34 billion) of its own shares, extending a policy of returning cash to shareholders even as the transition to low-emission vehicles adds to costs.】

item.title: 被赶下台的首席执行官加剧染料公司与达勒姆公司的权力斗争，呼吁公司出售产品
item.description: Dye & Durham Ltd.前首席执行官领导的一家公司称，这家加拿大软件公司应该出售自己。该公司股价大涨。【原文：A firm headed by the former chief executive officer of Dye & Durham Ltd. says the Canadian software company should put itself for sale. The shares surged.】

item.title: 特朗普向日本和韩国发出关税条款信函
item.description: 印度纳维孟买贾瓦哈拉尔-尼赫鲁港的作业。摄影师：Dhiraj Singh/Bloomberg【原文：Operations at the Jawaharlal Nehru Port in Navi Mumbai, India. Photographer: Dhiraj Singh/Bloomberg】

item.title: 巴西咖啡种植者种植更多咖啡树以提高产量
item.description: 巴西每 10 袋咖啡中就有 3 袋运往全球各地，它正在种植更多的树木，以提高产量。【原文：Brazil, which already ships three in every 10 bags of coffee traded globally, is planting more trees in a bid to ramp up output.】

item.title: 印度零售交易商在股票期权交易中损失 120 亿美元
item.description: 根据印度证券监管机构的一项研究，在截至 3 月的一年中，印度个人在全球股票衍生品交易的最大目的地损失了超过 1 万亿卢比（约合 122 亿美元）。【原文：Individuals in India lost over 1 trillion rupees ($12.2 billion) during the year ended March, trading equity derivatives in the world’s top destination for such products, according to a study by the country’s securities regulator.】

item.title: 沙特押注市场可承受欧佩克+增产，石油价格上涨
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯出人意料地提高了其主要原油等级的价格，这表明市场对欧佩克能够吸收更多原油投下了信心的一票。【原文：Oil crept higher as Saudi Arabia surprised customers in Asia by hiking prices for its main crude grade, signaling a vote of confidence that the market can absorb extra OPEC barrels.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 利用旨在限制股票损失的缓冲 ETF 来应对投资者的焦虑情绪
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理有限责任公司（Ark Investment Management LLC）正在进军快速增长的缓冲 ETF 市场，旨在限制股票损失，而此时她的科技基金却在不断流失资产。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management LLC is moving into the fast-growing market for buffer ETFs designed to limit equity losses, at a time when her tech funds continue to bleed assets.】

item.title: 智利多年来最大的铜矿意外收获预示着产量增加
item.description: 智利铜矿 6 月份的出口收入创下了三年多来的最好成绩，出口额的增长超过了价格的涨幅，这表明产量正在上升。【原文：Chilean copper mines had their best month of export revenue in more than three years in June, with the increase in value outstripping price gains in a sign of rising production.】

item.title: 华尔街建立 S&P 500 "无红利 "基金，躲避税收新政
item.description: 华尔街最新的避税手段并不藏身于开曼群岛，也不依赖于复杂的衍生工具。它的设计目的是将公开交易的基金变成一台自动驾驶的减税机器，静静地嗡嗡作响。【原文：Wall Street’s latest tax dodge doesn’t hide in the Cayman Islands or rely on complex derivatives. It’s engineered to turn a publicly traded fund into a tax-minimizing machine that hums quietly on autopilot.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 6 月原油产量仍低于欧佩克+的目标
item.description: 据熟悉数据的人士称，俄罗斯的石油数据显示，6月份的原油产量低于欧佩克+的目标。【原文：Russia’s oil data show crude output was below its OPEC+ target in June, according to people familiar with the figures.】

item.title: 简街为何成为印度打击期权交易的目标？
item.description: 印度在短短五年内就从一个高度投机的股票衍生品市场的小角色跃升为全球最大的市场。目前，该市场的日交易额约为 3 万亿美元。【原文：India has gone from being a small player in the highly speculative equity derivatives market to the world’s largest, all within just five years. Daily turnover in the market now sits at around $3 trillion.】

item.title: Adnoc 的 120 亿欧元 Covestro 交易可能面临欧盟的深入调查
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.）以 117 亿欧元（约合 137 亿美元）收购德国科思创公司（Covestro AG）的交易正面临着欧盟的深入调查，而欧盟拥有的权力可以遏制对该地区有影响力的外国投资。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s €11.7 billion ($13.7 billion) takeover of Covestro AG is facing the prospect of an in-depth European Union investigation, under powers that can curb influential foreign investment into the region.】

item.title: Susquehanna 关联公司以 25% 的溢价收购 10 亿美元的 IonQ 股份
item.description: IonQ 公司向苏斯克汉纳国际集团（Susquehanna International Group）的关联公司出售股票和认股权证，融资 10 亿美元，交易价格较这家量子计算公司周四的收盘价溢价 25%。【原文：IonQ Inc. raised $1 billion in a sale of stock and warrants to an affiliate of Susquehanna International Group, in a deal priced at a 25% premium to the quantum computing company’s closing price on Thursday.】

item.title: 胡塞武装称今年首次袭击红海船只
item.description: 也门胡塞武装声称对周日一艘驶过红海的船只遇袭事件负责，这是他们自 12 月以来首次袭击商船。【原文：Yemen’s Houthis have claimed responsibility for an attack on a ship sailing through the Red Sea on Sunday, in their first strike on merchant shipping since December.】

item.title: 安德鲁-左翼将出庭推翻欺诈指控
item.description: 激进做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）将于周一在联邦法院就一年前震惊业界的证券欺诈案出庭受审，这将引发一场关于投资者提示和言论自由的争论。【原文：Activist short seller Andrew Left is set to appear in federal court Monday in a securities fraud case that shook the industry a year ago, setting up a battle over investor tips and free speech.】

item.title: 特朗普关税截止日期前美元跳涨
item.description: 美元对全球货币汇率上涨，攀升至一周多来的最强水平，原因是人们猜测唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税不会像人们担心的那样严重损害美国经济，也不需要激进的降息来补救。【原文：The dollar rose against currencies globally, climbing to its strongest level in more than a week on speculation Donald Trump’s trade tariffs won’t hurt the US economy as badly as feared or require aggressive interest-rate cuts to remedy.】

item.title: 柴油供应紧张，市场呼唤桶装柴油
item.description: 全球最大的成品油市场对桶装油的需求量很大，因为交易商们正在努力应对夏季供应紧张的问题。【原文：The world’s biggest oil product market is hungry for barrels as traders grapple with a summer supply squeeze.】

item.title: Sunnova 的无担保债权人反对解除 KKR 的贷款责任
item.description: Sunnova Energy 的一些无担保债权人表示反对债务人占有式融资机制的最终批准，包括对申请前贷款人 KKR & Co.【原文：A group of Sunnova Energy’s unsecured creditors voiced opposition to the final approval of a debtor-in-possession facility, including a proposed legal release for pre-petition lender KKR & Co.】

item.title: 美国股市下滑，关税不确定性再度凸显
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统计划在周一晚些时候发出关税警告，市场对贸易问题的担忧再度升温，美国股市开盘下跌。【原文：US equities fell at the open as concerns about trade returned with President Donald Trump planning to deliver tariff warnings later on Monday.】

item.title: 炙手可热的垃圾贷款市场遭遇绊脚石，投资者倍感压力
item.description: 夏季前的垃圾贷款狂潮使市场开始过热，在利差达到多年来最窄的水平后，促使投资者对交易更加挑剔。【原文：A pre-summer frenzy in junk loans is seeing the market start to overheat, prompting investors to get a bit more picky about deals after spreads reached the tightest levels in years.】

item.title: 伊拉克希望在炼油厂升级后出口剩余石油产品
item.description: 伊拉克总理穆罕默德-希亚-苏达尼表示，伊拉克今年的汽油生产将实现自给自足，并力争在完成炼油厂扩建项目后成为剩余石油产品出口国。【原文：Iraq will be self-sufficient in gasoline production this year and aims to be an exporter of surplus oil products on completion of its refinery-expansion projects, according to Prime Minister Mohammed Shia Al-Sudani.】

item.title: 多诺霍将留任欧元集团推动货币升值
item.description: 爱尔兰的帕夏尔-多诺霍将再次当选欧元区财长小组主席，继续在该地区提升共同货币地位的努力中发挥领导作用。【原文：Ireland’s Paschal Donohoe is set to be reelected as president of the euro area’s group of finance ministers, retaining a leading role in the region’s efforts to enhance the profile of its common currency.】

item.title: 以色列维持利率不变，让通胀有时间回到目标水平
item.description: 以色列中央银行连续第 12 次维持利率不变，为近期谢克尔的反弹提供了更多时间来减缓通胀，并为降低借贷成本铺平道路。【原文：Israel’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for the 12th consecutive time, giving a recent rally in the shekel more time to slow inflation and pave the way for lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: CoreWeave 将以约 90 亿美元收购 Core Scientific
item.description: CoreWeave 公司表示，该公司已同意以价值约 90 亿美元的全股票交易收购 Core Scientific 公司，这将使该公司能够扩大其人工智能数据中心的容量。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. said it has agreed to buy Core Scientific Inc. in an all-stock deal worth about $9 billion that will allow it to expand its artificial intelligence data center capacity.】

item.title: 英国争取美国在关键期限前削减钢铁关税
item.description: 在本周三的最后期限到来之前，英国正努力争取美国同意将取消对英国钢铁征收关税的协议付诸实施。【原文：The UK is racing to secure US agreement to make operational a deal to eliminate tariffs on British steel ahead of a Wednesday deadline when American officials could choose instead to raise the levy to 50%.】

item.title: 工会称意大利斯泰兰迪斯上半年汽车产量下滑
item.description: 一家汽车工人工会警告说，Stellantis NV 的意大利汽车产量在上半年下降了三分之一，今年有望从 2024 年创下的数十年新低进一步下滑。【原文：Stellantis NV’s Italian car production cratered by a third in the first half and is poised to sink further this year from a multi-decade low set in 2024, an autoworkers’ union warned.】

item.title: 泽西海岸学区因增税避免破产
item.description: 新泽西州通过提高财产税的预算案后，新泽西州的一个学区将有可能避免申请破产。【原文：A New Jersey school district will likely avoid filing for bankruptcy after the state passed a budget that raised property taxes.】

item.title: 特里-史密斯在丹麦生命科学大会上抨击诺和诺德、Coloplast
item.description: 特里-史密斯（Terry Smith）抨击了丹麦最大的两家生命科学公司--诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和Coloplast公司（Coloplast A/S），因为这两家公司影响了这位经常被称为 "英国巴菲特 "的人所管理的股票基金。【原文：Terry Smith slammed two of Denmark’s largest life sciences companies — Novo Nordisk A/S and Coloplast A/S — after they weighed on the equity fund run by the man often dubbed ‘Britain’s Warren Buffett.’】

item.title: 关税抑制中美需求，奔驰汽车销量下滑
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税引发的贸易紧张局势打击了美国和中国的需求，梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）第二季度的汽车销量出现下滑。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG’s vehicle sales declined in the second quarter after trade tensions led by President Donald Trump’s tariffs hit demand in the US and China.】

item.title: 战略公司第二季度未实现收益达 140 亿美元
item.description: 由于比特币价格反弹以及最近的会计变更，迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "公司在第二季度获得了 140.5 亿美元的未实现收益。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy registered an unrealized gain of $14.05 billion in the second quarter due to a rebound in Bitcoin’s price and a recent accounting change.】
